topics: LB Theory and practice of education
subject: Article
PeerReviewed
fullText:
Reviews
appeal to larger organizations, and in some
cases, they could provide flexible cost-effective
TBT in broad areas such as management,
customer services, induction training and the
like. The reader would at the very least be able to
ascertain the availability of material, and be at a
point to commence negotiations with suppliers
for courseware to suit their particular needs.
Lindsay Offer, Anglia Polytechnic University
Erratum for Volume 8, Number 1
We apologize for not including an appropriate acknowledgement to the publisher of
ActivStats in the paper entitled 'Active learning of statistics: a case study', by Erica Morris
and Eileen Scanlon, which appeared in Volume 8, Number 1 of this journal. ActivStats is
published by Longman Software Publishing. The ActivStats screen shots shown in Figure
2, Figure 3 and Figure 4 of that article are reproduced by permission of Longman
Software Publishing.
